---
title: "ORF Grabbing"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
sample_seq<-read.fasta("./input/sample_sequence.fasta")
sample_seq <- unlist(sample_seq, use.names = F)
sample_seq <- paste(sample_seq, collapse = "")
sample_seq<-gsub("([actg])","\\U\\1",sample_seq,perl=T)
miracle<- gsub("(ATG([ACTG]{3,3})+?((TAA)|(TAG)|(TGA)))","hello this is an ORF!!!!!!!!!!!",sample_seq)
miracle

#or
(ATG([ACTG]{3,3})+?((TAA)|(TAG)|(TGA)){1,3})
#or
grep((ATG([ACTG]{3,3}){1,3}?((TAA)|(TAG)|(TGA)), value = TRUE
      

```
